DOC.brief_summary: To assess safety efficacy GORE Conformable TAG® Thoracic Endoprosthesis primary treatment aneurysm descend thoracic aorta ( DTA ) > Primary Hypothesis : The proportion subject free major device event 1 month post-treatment significantly less 0.95 , represent proportion observe previous clinical study GORE TAG® Thoracic Endoprosthesis
DOC.brief_title: Thoracic Endoprosthesis Treatment Aneurysm Descending Thoracic Aortic
DOC.criteria: 1 . Presence DTA aneurysm deem warrant surgical repair > Fusiform ( ≥50 mm ) , > Saccular ( diameter criterion ) 2 . Subject > 21 year age > 3 . Proximal distal land zone length ≥ 2.0 cm Landing zone must native aorta Landing zone may include left subclavian artery , necessary 4 . All proximal distal land zone inner diameter 1642 mm > • Diameter assess flow lumen thrombus , present ; calcium exclude > 5 . Life expectancy > 2 year > 6 . Able tolerate thoracotomy > 7 . Male infertile female > 8 . Able comply protocol requirement include followingup > 9 . Signed informed consent > > > 1 . Differing proximal distal neck diameter ( aortic taper ) outside intend aortic diameter requirement ( size guide ) single endoprosthesis diameter inability use device different diameter ( adherence size guide ) compensate taper > 2 . Tortuous stenotic iliac and/or femoral artery inability use conduit vascular access > 3 . Aneurysmal , dissect , heavily calcify , heavily thrombose land zone ( ) > 4 . Mycotic aneurysm > 5 . Hemodynamically unstable aneurysm rupture > 6 . Aortic dissection > 7 . Planned coverage leave carotid celiac artery CTAG Device > 8 . Planned concomitant surgical procedure ( left subclavian transposition wireless sac pressure monitoring ) , major surgery within 30 day treatment date > 9 . Known degenerative connective tissue disease , e.g . Marfan EhlerDanlos Syndrome > 10 . Known history drug abuse > 11 . ASA risk classification = V ( moribund patient expect live 24 hour without operation ) > 12 . NYHA class IV > 13 . Participating another investigational device drug study within 1 year treatment > 14 . Subject known sensitivity allergies device material > 15 . Subject systemic infection may increase risk endovascular graft infection >
